name: Rocky Ride
description:
Welcome to the "Rocky Ride" solo developed arcade race!
You’re about to see some cool maneuvers, unpredictable circuits, crazy speeds and dangerous rivals. A crazy race on a fast buggy car among steep rocks and dense forests.
You need collect the items to win. Upgrade your buggy: make it faster and faster to go ahead! Pick any of the many different tracks, and go! To the prize points!

- Various routes of the most fancy configurations
- Nice 3D graphics
- Realistic physics

The game was made by one person, on enthusiasm. Programmed, drew models, etc.
